pkgmetadata.longdescription: Independently Interpretable Lasso // Efficient algorithms for fitting linear / logistic regression model with Independently Interpretable Lasso. Takada, M., Suzuki, T., Fujisawa, H. (2018). Independently Interpretable Lasso: A New Regularizer for Sparse Regression with Uncorrelated Variables. AISTATS. http://proceedings.mlr.press/v84/takada18a/takada18a.pdf.
